Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

nee va va kaikooda

ennaennavo aagum

idayill ulla mogam

 English Translation
I tried my best :)
its a deceiving evening
come join hands
its hunt by two eyes
come  join me

will lips speak with eyes ?
will youth join our hands ?

will mind sleep at least a second?

fire fire, you tasted like a fire
as I touch you became empty
fire fire, two fires at night
as it decrease, you kept joining me

hey girl girl girl
you soak me in RUM
now, you show up
just dance getting closer

golden mango mango mango
heat given by two cheek
you get my soul
its a night land, you search for prey

fire fire, you tasted like a fire
as I touch you became empty
fire fire, two fires at night
as it decrease, you kept joined me

if you are a beautiful word
then dot is an end of your shyness
when praising you slowly
language itself will get tired

power in this girl without particles
her lips are two line poems

its time to wet the upper lip
and lower lip
soul will come from top to
bottom
its a lust gap between touching
and pushing
might happen to submerge in honey kiss

fire fire ..
fire fire, you tasted like a fire
as I touch you became empty
fire fire, two fires at night
as it decrease, you kept joining me

this is how we like to do it
this is how we like to do it

non freezing hips kill
by hitting heart
parts that are small
will ask to fondle

moving assets in you are huge
heroic magics are huge in me

just saw a rainbow with legs
along the roadside
just saw drizzle in the moving
flower park
jus saw a bird that smiles
like a dew
just saw fire joining honey

as I touch you became empty

as it decrease, you kept joining me
